Package org.fudgemsg.taxon

Allows for working with the Fudge Taxonomy system.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
FudgeTaxonomy A Fudge Taxonomy is a mapping from ordinals to names for fields in a Fudge Encoded data format.
TaxonomyResolver A Taxonomy Resolver can identify a FudgeTaxonomy instance that is appropriate for a message with a specific taxonomy ID.
 

Class Summary
ImmutableMapTaxonomyResolver An implementation of TaxonomyResolver which is backed by a Map.
MapFudgeTaxonomy An implementation of FudgeTaxonomy where all lookups are specified at construction time and held in a Map.
PropertyFileTaxonomy An implementation of MapFudgeTaxonomy that is populated from an arbitrary source of properties.
RESTfulTaxonomyResolver A concrete implementation of a URLTaxonomyResolver that constructs URLs by substituting the taxonomy ID into a given string.
URLTaxonomyResolver A taxonomy resolver that will retrieve a taxonomy from a URL.
 

Package org.fudgemsg.taxon Description

Allows for working with the Fudge Taxonomy system.

For more details, please see the Taxonomy page on the Fudge web site.
